short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grow your Twitter account by replying using AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MagicReply is the fastest way to reply to X (formerly known as Twitter)

With the help of AI you can generate thoughtful replies to posts and grow on X (Twitter)


How it works?
1. Go to https://magicreply.io and buy a subscription
2. Add this extension to Chrome and reload it
4. Open the extension and paste the API key you got from magicreply.io
5. Go to x.com and click on Reply in any post
6. Press on the star logo to generate reply


Website: https://magicreply.io
